q: Anthony Ervin and Allen Iverson , and Linas Kleiza filled the role Thursday. He got going early, leaking out on the fast break and getting easy layups. He then moved to the outside, going 4-for-8 from 3-point range. He got a couple of easy ones, and once you get a couple of layups, the basket looks bigger, said Allen Iverson , who had 28 points.`` He played a great game, and hopefully he can continue to play that way.'' Kobe Bryant managed just 18 points while committing six turnovers in 41 minutes.`` I don't approach the game like it's Kobe Bryant , and I want to have a Shaquille O'Neal game against him,'' Allen Iverson said. I want to play a good game against everybody. When you play well against another great player, it's only natural for you to feel good about the win. But that's not the most important thing for me.
